title: The Protectors beta v0.8.1 patch
description:
Simply unpack and install over 0.8.

The all-about-orcs chapter is available in version 0.8.1, and with it the possibility of creating and enjoying more text-based quests at a higher level (along with the exciting battles, of course). A great amount of time has been spent on rewriting the dialogues in hopes of giving them a more fantasy-medieval style. New ambushes and text pop-ups have been added to previous chapters as well.
The A.I. is now smarter and deadlier. Heroes know how to use their Racial Synergy Bonus.
We also added three new units: the Frost Bat, the Chaos Dragon and the Rock Giant. Dwarves can now throw axes and wood-elves can train horse archers.
Last but not least, this patch contains several bug fixes, including the Chaos Magic bug fix. See the changelog for more info.
